title: STAT+: A seasoned biotech VC looks to 2026 and sees a wave of IPOs coming
description: One of the biotech industry’s most esteemed venture capitalists anticipates that, after two years of drought, a wave of drug companies are set to go public.
content: One of the biotech industry’s most esteemed venture capitalists anticipates that, after two years of drought, a wave of drug companies are set to go public.
